text: Ujina 4-chōme is a Hiroden station (tram stop) on Hiroden Ujina Line, located in Minami-ku, Hiroshima. ==Routes== From Ujina 4-chōme Station, there are three of Hiroden Streetcar routes. *25px Hiroshima Station - Hiroshima Port Route *25px Hiroden-nishi-hiroshima - Hiroshima Port Route *25px Hiroshima Station - (via Hijiyama-shita) - Hiroshima Port Route ==Connections== ;█ Ujina Line :25px 25px 25px ::Ujina 3-chōme — Ujina 4-chōme — Ujina 5-chōme ==Around station== *Hiroshima Municipal Ujina Elementary School *Ujina Nursery School *Kanda Shrine ==History== *Opened as "7-chome" on December 27, 1935. *Renamed to "Ujina 7-chome" on March 30, 1960. *Renamed to the present name "Ujina 4-chome" on September 1, 1968. ==See also== *Hiroden Streetcar Lines and Routes *List of railway stations in Japan ==External links== Ujina 4-chome Station Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1935
